results.name: Expansion of 1/((1-x)^7-x^7).
comment: Differs for n >= 7 (1717 vs. 1716) from A000579(n+6) = binomial(n+6,6); see also row 6 of A027555, A059481 and A213808. - _M. F. Hasler_, Mar 05 2017
